bcbioRNASeq
  • Reference

Column Data

Improved assignment method support for a bcbioRNASeq object.

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
colData(x, return = c("data.frame", "DataFrame"))

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq,data.frame
colData(x) <- value

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq,DataFrame
colData(x) <- value

Arguments

x

Object.
return

Return as "data.frame" or "DataFrame".
value

Value to assign.

Value

Data describing the columns of the object.

Details

This method support will also update the nested colData() inside the assays slot.

See also

help("colData", "SummarizedExperiment")

Other Data Functions: counts, rowData, selectSamples, subset, tmm, tpm

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/bcb_small.rda", package = "bcbioRNASeq"))

# bcbioRNASeq ====
colData(bcb_small) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 6
#> Variables: 8
#> $ sampleID    <fct> control_rep1, control_rep2, control_rep3, fa_day7_rep1,...
#> $ sampleName  <fct> control_rep1, control_rep2, control_rep3, fa_day7_rep1,...
#> $ description <fct> control_rep1, control_rep2, control_rep3, fa_day7_rep1,...
#> $ day         <fct> 0, 0, 0, 7, 7, 7
#> $ replicate   <fct> 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3
#> $ strain      <fct> Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c
#> $ tissue      <fct> kidney, kidney, kidney, kidney, kidney, kidney
#> $ treatment   <fct> control, control, control, folic_acid, folic_acid, foli...

# Assignment method support
# All columns will be coerced to factors
colData(bcb_small)[["age"]] <- c(14L, 30L, 14L, 30L, 14L, 30L)
colData(bcb_small) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 6
#> Variables: 9
#> $ sampleID    <fct> control_rep1, control_rep2, control_rep3, fa_day7_rep1,...
#> $ sampleName  <fct> control_rep1, control_rep2, control_rep3, fa_day7_rep1,...
#> $ description <fct> control_rep1, control_rep2, control_rep3, fa_day7_rep1,...
#> $ day         <fct> 0, 0, 0, 7, 7, 7
#> $ replicate   <fct> 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3
#> $ strain      <fct> Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c, Balb/c
#> $ tissue      <fct> kidney, kidney, kidney, kidney, kidney, kidney
#> $ treatment   <fct> control, control, control, folic_acid, folic_acid, foli...
#> $ age         <fct> 14, 30, 14, 30, 14, 30
